Kettering.WROU-FM: WROU-FM is an Urban Adult Contemporary radio station at 92.1 FM licensed to West Carrollton, Ohio serving the Dayton area and owned and operated by Alpha Media. WROU is Dayton's affiliate of The Tom Joyner Morning Show. Its studios are located in Kettering, Ohio (with a Dayton address) and its transmitter is in west Dayton.
